@@ -47,0 +33,14 @@
+/*
+  @test
+  @key headful
+  @bug 7154072 7161320
+  @summary Tests that key events with modifiers are not swallowed.
+  @requires (os.family != "windows")

+  @build Util
+  @run main SwallowKeyEvents
+*/

@@ -86,0 +86,2 @@
